If you're looking for a psychological thriller with a mix of excitement and warmth, I would recommend "The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo" (2011). It's a well-crafted mystery that follows a young journalist and a disgraced investigator as they uncover a dark conspiracy. The film has a great balance of suspense and character development, and the cast is excellent.

Another great option is "Nightcrawler" (2014), which explores the dark side of obsession and fixation. The film follows a young man who becomes fascinated with capturing violent crimes on video and will stop at nothing to get the footage he needs. It's a thought-provoking and suspenseful thriller that raises important questions about media manipulation and societal values.
